trans-unit.source: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.
trans-unit.target: 建立的容器，其他控制項可以在其中共用水平或垂直空間。

trans-unit.source: Use a ToolStripPanel to hold one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> or user-defined controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ToolStripPanel 保存一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>或使用者定義的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: You might find that one or more ToolStripPanel controls meet the needs of your application better than a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> if you do not need the four panels and the central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會發現一或多個 ToolStripPanel 控制項符合優於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>如果您不需要四個面板和中央<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>應用程式的需求

trans-unit.source: You can use only one panel if you so choose, and ToolStripPanel works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇，而且 ToolStripPanel 都適用於多個文件介面 (MDI) 案例，您可以使用只有一個面板。

trans-unit.source: Each ToolStripPanel is expandable and collapsible.
trans-unit.target: 每個 ToolStripPanel 是可展開及摺疊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>調整表單的大小時自動調整其大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically resizes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>自動調整大小; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 開始初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 擷取集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得的空間，以像素的控制項之間的預設指定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控制項之間的預設間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得內部間距，以像素的控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控制項內容的內部間距。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其父控制項停駐的控制項框線，並決定控制項隨其父代的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is None.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 None。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化結束<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>在指定的位置。

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value representing the x- and y-client coordinates, in pixels, of the new location for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>像素為單位的新位置值，代表 x 和 y client 協調<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> in the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>中指定的資料列。

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>加入。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The row parameter is less than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: row 參數為小於零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>位於指定座標。

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 水平的工作區座標，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The vertical client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的工作區座標，像素為單位。

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>時呼叫該 OnControlAdded 方法

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnControlAdded 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: The that contains the raftingContainerPoint, or if no such exists.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> used to customize the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>用於自訂的外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref>可處理繪製。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spacing, in pixels, between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>s and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>值，代表間距 （像素）。
